title: Lol friends
body: So I deleted lol friends on accident and when I redownloaded it and tried to get on it wouldn't let me so I tried again and it still won't let me on so I deleted it got it again and same thing then I restarted my phone and nothing is showing up and I tried changing my pass and still nothing plz send help

replies.body:
Damn, I'm sorry to hear you're having issues with the League Friends app. I'd recommend posting this as a bug report on the [**Mobile App Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/mobile-app-discussion) so this issue can be tracked.

Let me know if you have any questions.
